Package gw.api.databuilder

Class RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder

java.lang.Object
gw.api.databuilder.DataBuilder<RecoveryTAccountLineItem,RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder>
gw.api.databuilder.CCDataBuilder<RecoveryTAccountLineItem,RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder>
gw.api.databuilder.RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DelegateDataBuilder<RecoveryTAccountLineItem>, ValueGenerator<RecoveryTAccountLineItem>
@Deprecated public class RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder extends CCDataBuilder<RecoveryTAccountLineItem,RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder>
Deprecated.
Use of this builder is not necessary, except for GW internal application testing. Use the withStatus() method on Recovery/RecoveryReserve builders to setup RecoveryTaccounts correctly.

    • withDenormTransaction

      public RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder withDenormTransaction(TAccountTransaction denormTransaction)
      Deprecated.
      Sets the denormalized FK to TAccountTransaction table in order to speed up certain queries. If both CreditingTransactionID and DebitingTransactionID are not null, then this field is NULL, otherwise this field will have same value as the non-null FK. This allows us to query against this field only when looking for TAccountTransactions that are currently contributing to a TAccount.
      Parameters:
      denormTransaction - the desired value
      Returns:
      the modified builder

    • withDenormTransaction

      public RecoveryTAccountLineItemBuilder withDenormTransaction(ValueGenerator<? extends TAccountTransaction> denormTransaction)
      Deprecated.
      Sets the denormalized FK to TAccountTransaction table in order to speed up certain queries. If both CreditingTransactionID and DebitingTransactionID are not null, then this field is NULL, otherwise this field will have same value as the non-null FK. This allows us to query against this field only when looking for TAccountTransactions that are currently contributing to a TAccount.
      Parameters:
      denormTransaction - a value generator that will return the desired value
      Returns:
      the modified builder
